item.title: How to make a starter
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“zIHAVOKIz, post:1, topic:282378”]ok this is a dumb question but i just got into making/editing servers and i want to make a starter command like when u first log in u type ::starter and get a few items, i have done it but i dont know how to make it so you can only use it once can some one help me

here is what ive got

} else if (cmd[0].equals(“starter”)){
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6568, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1079, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1127, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1305, 1);[/quote]

} else if (cmd[0].equals("starter")){
             if (starter == 0) {
	 Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6568, 1);
	 Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1079, 1);
	 Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1127, 1);
	 Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1305, 1);

hopefully i helped
